name: Clicky Mouse (Himanshu0047)
description:
Smash everything before they fall down, but don't hit the skulls.
That's how easy it is to play Clicky Mouse!

Start your addiction to the smashing and experience the thrill of setting the highest score, just don't drop any object other than the skulls!

How to play :

Choose difficulty and start the game.

Click with your mouse or tap on your touch screen device on the objects to destroy them.
